name: Danganronpa. Despair Among Us
description:
Danganronpa. Despair Among Us DEMO

Description :

Written a letter to the "Symbol of Hope" Lyceum, Danieru was lucky to enroll here thanks to the Talent Development Program. On the day of entering ceremony, overslept, he still goes to his destination, but, after going inside, he loses consciousness. Will he be able to get out with other fifteen students and survive the next Killing Game?

Info :

"DR. DAU" Novel at this moment on Demo Phase. Last version - Demo 1.1.

Contain temporary sprites.
